header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: discussing Norwich vs. Cambridge, making plans to move to a different city/place.
header.activity: A couple having Sunday lunch and discussing cities.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, complaining, anecdote telling, making arrangements, telling jokes

speaker.fls: French -- level unspecified; German -- level unspecified
